instructions: You can open an NXTHEME file in the Windows version of Switch Theme Injector to extract the JSON and JPG files it is comprised of. To do so, open Switch Theme Injector, select EXTRACT NXTHEME, and then select OPEN NXTHEME.
To install NXTHEME files on your Nintendo Switch, you must first hack your Switch and install the NXThemes application. Then, you can use NXThemes to install the theme your NXTHEME files contain.
